LanguageData.Powerview.Playsetting.Tooltip:
Toggle Electrical Grid.

While on, it will show an overlay with the electrical grid. The grid will display different colors according to its status:
Gray: There is no buildings using energy connected.
Blue: The energy production of the grid is greater than its consumption.
Yellow: The energy grid is draining batteries.\Red: The energy production of the grid is lower than its consumption and there is no energy stored in batteries.
